info.title: Payment Advice (A2X)
info.description: You can use this inbound synchronous service to create, read, update, and delete payment advices related to a customer or a supplier. It is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in SAP Fiori apps and other user interfaces. The service can be used with payment advices of any supported type.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete payment advices synchronously using this inbound service

get.description: Reads data of all payment advices, based on the specified filter conditions.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a new payment advice, based on the key fields and properties specified in the request body.

get.description: Reads data of the payment advice defined by the provided key fields.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates a specific payment advice, based on the key fields and properties specified in the request body.

delete.description: Deletes a specific payment advice, based on the provided key fields.

get.summary: Reads all item fields for a specific payment advice header.
get.description: Reads all items for a specific payment advice header defined by the provided key fields.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates items for a specific payment advice header.
post.description: Creates items for a specific payment advice header defined by the provided key fields.

get.summary: Reads all item fields for all payment advice headers.
get.description: Reads all items for all payment advice headers, based on the specified filter conditions.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates items for a specific payment advice header.
post.description: Creates items for a specific payment advice header, based on the key fields and properties specified in the request body.

get.summary: Reads all fields of a specific payment advice item.
get.description: Reads all payment advice item fields specified by the item key.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates items for a specific payment advice header.
patch.description: Updates items for a specific payment advice header, based on the key fields and properties specified in the request body.

delete.summary: Deletes a specific payment advice item.
delete.description: Deletes a specific payment advice item defined by the provided key fields.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_PaymentAdvice HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
